docs.title: Rule-ROM Federation 🏛️Rule-ROM
docs.text:
Global Registry of Executable Intentions

Synchronization point for developers, scientists, and business.

An expandable federation of technical standards. We create a universal control bus — from C source code to neuromorphic silicon and industrial automation. Any technology where "best practices" and safety rules can be formalized can be integrated into the Registry.

docs.title: Federation Domains
docs.text:
🌿 C-SAFE

Legacy Immunization: Clang AST + Garden-Core validation for deterministic C code.

c-safe.rulerom.com 🧠 Decima

Neuromorphic substrate with PHASE_READ/WRITE at 20µs. Hardware that breathes.

decima.rulerom.com 🧪 Bakery

Deterministic personality baking. OCR, HFT, ASR — fast, dense, verified.

bakery.rulerom.com 🔈 Audrey

Analog soul. Vacuum electronics, tube amps, frequency physics that outlives eras.

audrey.rulerom.com

docs.title: Infrastructure
docs.text: 🔑 PKI Portal pki.rulerom.com 📓 Federation Log Change tracking

docs.title: Join the Federation
docs.text:
If you have ready specifications for engineering or software systems, propose a standard for integration: access@rulerom.com

Intent Pull Request Processing ✉️ intent@rulerom.com

Bake the Future. Build the Substrate.

🌿 Intent-Garden.Org

docs.title: 📝 How It Works
docs.text:
• Recording important changes
  • Monthly files: Each month is a separate .md file
  • Yearly folders: Each year has its own folder with 12 months

docs.title: 📅 Monthly Entries
docs.text: Month Link January 01.md February 02.md March 03.md April 04.md May 05.md June 06.md July 07.md August 08.md September 09.md October 10.md November 11.md December 12.md

docs.title: 📝 How to Add Entry
docs.text:
Add new entries at the top of the current month file:

## 2026-02-27

- Created 2026/01-12 folder structure
